items.title: Georgia Gov. Kemp signs 2 laws aimed at cutting jury awards and limiting when businesses and property owners can be held liable for negligence
items.description: Opponents of the new law note verdicts in the millions of dollars are rare, and those over $10 million represent less than 1% of outcomes.
